problems.question: According to Dalton's Atomic Theory, which statement is a key principle?
options: Atoms can be divided into smaller particles.
Atoms of one element can be converted into atoms of another element.
All matter is made up of tiny particles called atoms.
Atoms of the same element can have different masses.

problems.question: Which subatomic particle has a positive charge and is found in the nucleus?
The central core of an atom, containing protons and neutrons, is called the:
